title: Indigenous Caucus Suppression
subtitle: Captured apparatus dissolves elected leadership
summary: Compliance officers dissolved the Indigenous caucus and replaced elected delegates with appointed surrogates aligned with national consultants.

thesis_elements_proven.how_proven: Credential challenges, revised bylaws, and recorded directives demonstrate intentional dissolution.

act_i.title: Signal the crackdown
act_i.summary: Compliance staff announce audits of Indigenous caucus procedures.
key_events: Audit notice sent hours after caucus requests vote
Consultants advise freezing caucus bank access

act_ii.title: Dissolve the leadership
act_ii.summary: Caucus is declared in violation and leadership removed.
key_events: Appointees sworn in without caucus vote
act_ii.smoking_gun: Audio clip: 'If they want back in, they need to accept the new structure.'

act_iii.title: Rewrite the future
act_iii.summary: New bylaws strip caucus of independent meeting authority.
key_events: Bylaws require compliance sign-off for agendas

for_organizers: Secure independent communication channels before compliance moves. Once dissolved, the caucus loses negotiating leverage.
